!" 

Defender Jordi Alba reflects on his goal in the UEFA EURO 2012 final – Spain's second in the 4-0 defeat of Italy in Kyiv. Alba initially picked up the ball in his own half, but a 50-metre sprint forward allowed him to latch onto Xavi Hernández's pass and fire past Gianluigi Buffon.
